sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zhèngzài xúnzhǎo wǒ de yàoshi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je cherche mes clés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I am looking for my keys.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Huìyì yáncháng le yī gè xiǎoshí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La réunion a été prolongée d'une heure.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The meeting was extended by one hour.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā xùnsù zuò chū le fǎnyìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a réagi rapidement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He reacted quickly.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng zài zhèlǐ qiānmíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez signer ici.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please sign here.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā dǎpò le shìjiè jìlù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a battu le record du monde.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He broke the world record.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā xiàdìng juéxīn yào chénggōng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est déterminé à réussir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is determined to succeed.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zài yángtái shàng zhòng le huā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai planté des fleurs sur le balcon.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I planted flowers on the balcony.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Lù shàng yǒu hěn duō shítou.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de pierres sur la route.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many stones on the road.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yāo téng de lìhai.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a très mal au dos.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His waist hurts badly.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 她摇了摇头表示不同意。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yáo le yáo tóu biǎoshì bù tóngyì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle a secoué la tête pour exprimer son désaccord.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She shook her head to show disagreement.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他依然坚持自己的观点。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yīrán jiānchí zìjǐ de guāndiǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il maintient toujours son point de vue.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He still insists on his viewpoint.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这些商品是从国外进口的。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèxiē shāngpǐn shì cóng guówài jìnkǒu de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ces produits sont importés de l'étranger.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: These goods are imported from abroad.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yèyú shíjiān xǐhuan huàhuà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il aime dessiner pendant son temps libre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He likes to paint in his spare time.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuan yīnyuè yǐjí diànyǐng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime la musique ainsi que les films.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like music as well as movies.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 如果有疑问，请随时问我。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Rúguǒ yǒu yíwèn, qǐng suíshí wèn wǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Si vous avez des questions, n'hésitez pas à me demander.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: If you have any questions, please feel free to ask me.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bǐsài yào gōngpíng jìnxíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La compétition doit se dérouler équitablement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The competition should be conducted fairly.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 每个公民都有纳税的义务。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Měi gè gōngmín dōu yǒu nàshuì de yìwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Chaque citoyen a le devoir de payer des impôts.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Every citizen has the obligation to pay taxes.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dàjiā dōu zài yìlùn zhè jiàn shì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tout le monde discute de cette affaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Everyone is discussing this matter.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yǒu yǒngqì miànduì kùnnan.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a le courage d'affronter les difficultés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has the courage to face difficulties.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ kàndào le tā de yǐngzi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai vu son ombre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I saw his shadow.
